languages.text: The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of the Imperium's society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.
languages.original_text: Слепое следование догмам — один из факторов, обеспечивающих процветание и само существование Империума. Но бунтарская натура, подобная вашей, не позволит загнать себя в столь жесткие рамки. Благопристойная жизнь в Империуме имеет обратную сторону, готовую предоставить неласковый приют тем, кто отказался следовать букве закона, встав на скользкий путь контрабанды и других сомнительных махинаций. В число этих опасных и изворотливых личностей входили и вы.

traits.locale_text: The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of Imperial society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.

The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of the Imperium's society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.

The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of the Imperium's society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.

languages.text: Das Imperium überlebt und gedeiht nicht zuletzt aufgrund seiner engen Sichtweise, aber ein rebellischer Geist und Wille wie der deine lässt sich nicht so leicht bändigen. Die dunklen Pfade der Schmuggler und Abtrünnigen, die sich hinter der Fassade der Gesellschaft des Imperiums schlängeln, bieten eine gefährliche Zuflucht für diejenigen, die sich nicht dem Gesetz beugen wollen. Du warst einst einer dieser gefährlichen, aber einfallsreichen Menschen.
languages.original_text: The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of the Imperium's society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.

traits.locale_text: Das Imperium überlebt und gedeiht nicht zuletzt aufgrund seiner engen Sichtweise, aber ein rebellischer Geist und Wille wie der deine lässt sich nicht so leicht bändigen. Die dunklen Pfade der Schmuggler und Abtrünnigen, die sich hinter der Fassade der imperialen Gesellschaft schlängeln, bieten eine gefährliche Zuflucht für diejenigen, die sich nicht dem Gesetz beugen wollen. Du warst einst einer dieser gefährlichen, aber einfallsreichen Menschen.

languages.text: L'Imperium survit et prospère en grande partie grâce à l'étroitesse de sa vision, mais un esprit rebelle comme le vôtre ne se laisse pas dompter aussi facilement. La clandestinité dans laquelle opèrent les contrebandiers et les renégats derrière la façade de la société impériale est un refuge bien hasardeux pour ceux qui refusent de se plier à la loi. Vous étiez autrefois l'un de ces individus dangereux, mais pleins de ressources.
languages.original_text: The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of the Imperium's society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.

traits.locale_text: L'Imperium survit et prospère en grande partie grâce à l'étroitesse de sa vision, mais un esprit rebelle comme le vôtre ne se laisse pas dompter aussi facilement. La clandestinité dans laquelle opèrent les contrebandiers et les renégats derrière la façade de la société impériale est un refuge bien hasardeux pour ceux qui refusent de se plier à la loi. Vous étiez autrefois l'un de ces individus dangereux, mais pleins de ressources.

languages.text: 帝国之所以能繁荣发展，很大程度上要归功于帝国臣民狭隘的视野与思想。然而，像您这种充满叛逆思想、意志果决的人，是不会轻易臣服的。在帝国社会的表象之下，隐藏着属于走私者与叛逆者的黑暗道路，为那些不愿服从法律的人们提供了危险的庇护所。这个阶层的人极其危险、足智多谋，而您之前就是其中一员。
languages.original_text: The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of the Imperium's society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.

traits.locale_text: 帝国之所以能繁荣发展，很大程度上要归功于帝国臣民狭隘的视野与思想。然而，像您这种充满叛逆思想、意志果决的人，是不会轻易臣服的。在帝国社会的表象之下，隐藏着属于走私者与叛逆者的黑暗道路，为那些不愿服从法律的人们提供了危险的庇护所。这个阶层的人极其危险、足智多谋，而您之前就是其中一员。

languages.text: El Imperium sobrevive y prospera en gran parte gracias a su estrechez de miras, pero una mente y una voluntad rebeldes como las tuyas no son tan fáciles de contener. El oscuro camino de los contrabandistas y renegados que actúan bajo la fachada de la sociedad del Imperium es un refugio peligroso para quienes no se inclinan ante la ley. Estabas entre estos peligrosos e ingeniosos individuos.
languages.original_text: The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of the Imperium's society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.

traits.locale_text: El Imperium sobrevive y prospera en gran parte gracias a su estrechez de miras, pero una mente y una voluntad rebeldes como las tuyas no son tan fáciles de contener. El oscuro camino de los contrabandistas y renegados que actúan bajo la fachada de la sociedad Imperial es un refugio peligroso para quienes no se inclinan ante la ley. Estabas entre estos peligrosos e ingeniosos individuos.

languages.text: 帝国が存続し繁栄しているのは、その視野狭窄によるところも少なくない。だが、あなたのような反抗的な心と意志は、そう簡単に束縛されるものではない。密輸業者や反逆者たちの暗黒の道が、帝国社会の裏に曲がりくねり、法に屈しない者たちに危険な避難所を提供している。あなたはかつて、このような危険だが機知に富んだ人物の一人だった。
languages.original_text: The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained. The dark paths of smugglers and renegades that wind behind the facade of the Imperium's society offer a dangerous refuge for those unwilling to bow to the law. You used to be one of these dangerous yet resourceful individuals.

traits.locale_text: 帝国が存続し繁栄しているのは、その視野狭窄によるところも少なくない。だが、あなたのような反抗的な心と意志は、そう簡単に束縛されるものではない。密輸業者や反逆者たちの暗黒の道が、帝国社会の裏に曲がりくねり、法に屈しない者たちに危険な避難所を提供している。あなたはかつて、このような危険だが機知に富んだ人物の一人だった。

languages.text: Слепое следование догмам — один из факторов, обеспечивающих процветание и само существование Империума. Но бунтарская натура, подобная вашей, не позволит загнать себя в столь жесткие рамки. Благопристойная жизнь в Империуме имеет обратную сторону, готовую предоставить неласковый приют тем, кто отказался следовать букве закона, встав на скользкий путь контрабанды и других сомнительных махинаций. В число этих опасных и изворотливых личностей входили и вы.

Благопристойная жизнь в Империуме имеет обратную сторону, готовую предоставить неласковый приют тем, кто отказался следовать букве закона, встав на скользкий путь контрабанды и других сомнительных махинаций. languages.text: İmparatorluk'un varlığını sürdürüp gelişmesinde insanların ona körü körüne bağlılığının azımsanamayacak yeri olsa da seninki gibi asi bir zihne ve iradeye ket vurmak kolay değil. İmparatorluk toplumunun vitrin arkasına gizlenmiş dolambaçlı kaçakçı ve muhalif yolları, yasalara boyun eğmeye gönlü olmayanlara tehlikeli bir sığınak sunar. Eskiden sen de bu tehlikeli ancak işini bilen şahıslardandın.
languages.original_text: The Imperium survives and prospers in no small part due to the narrowness of its vision, but a rebellious mind and will such as yours could not be so easily constrained.
